total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the coordinates of the non-zero numbers in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the direction of the line that will be drawn from the non-zero numbers. This can be done by checking the relative positions of the non-zero numbers.
Q3: Draw a line from the non-zero numbers in the direction determined in Q2. The line should be drawn until it hits the edge of the grid or another non-zero number.
Q4: The line should be drawn with the color of the non-zero number from which it starts.
Q1: Identify the cells that contain the numbers 4, 8, and 5 in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the direction of the line that connects the cells containing the numbers 4, 8, and 5.
Q3: Fill in the cells along the line from the cell containing the number 4 to the cell containing the number 5 with the number 4.
Q4: Fill in the cells along the line from the cell containing the number 5 to the cell containing the number 8 with the number 5.
Q5: Fill in the cells along the line from the cell containing the number 8 to the cell containing the number 4 with the number 8.

Q3: Draw a line from the non-zero numbers in the direction determined in Q2 until it hits another non-zero number or the edge of the grid.
Q4: Fill in the line with the color of the non-zero number from which it started.
